engine.errorDefaultRemediation: Please check the connection and try again.

errors.nestedTooDeep: Data structure is too deeply nested at: {path}
errors.securityViolation: Security violation: Unsafe resource loading blocked.
errors.sriMismatch: Security violation: Resource integrity (SRI) mismatch detected.
errors.bridgeDisposed: Engine bridge has already been disposed.
errors.notReady: Engine is not ready for the requested operation.
errors.loaderRequired: IEngineLoader is required for secure resource loading.
errors.invalidPositionString: Invalid position string: Input must not be empty.
errors.invalidEngineId: Invalid engine ID: "{id}". Only alphanumeric characters, hyphens, and underscores are allowed.
errors.insecureConnection: Insecure connection (HTTP) is not allowed for sensitive engine files.
errors.sriBypassNotAllowed: SRI bypass (__unsafeNoSRI) is not allowed in production environment.
errors.adapterFactoryInvalidReturn: Factory for "{adapter}" returned an invalid object.
errors.adapterNotFound: Engine adapter not found or factory not registered for "{id}".
errors.resourceLoadUnknown: Unknown error during resource loading for engine "{engineId}".
errors.missingMainEntryPoint: Engine resources are missing 'main' entry point URL.

generic.invalidOptionValue: Option value must be a primitive (string, number, or boolean)
